Package com.ooyala.android.util

  • Interface Summary 
    Interface Description
    IMatchObjectPredicate<T>  
    OrderedMapValue<K>  
  • Class Summary 
    Class Description
    Constants
    OoyalaPlayer constants.
    DebugMode
    A tool that provides two new features: (1) Hiding all Ooyala debug logs, and (2) enforcing a "strict mode" to force runtime exceptions on assertions throughout the Ooyala SDK.
    DownloadTask
    A class that handles single file download
    OrderedMap<K,V extends OrderedMapValue<K>>  
    SDCardLogcatOoyalaEventsLogger
    Created by pbq on 1/24/16.
    TemporaryInternalStorageFile
    This is a simple helper around a Java File, with the file parent directory always being the internal cache dir of the given Context.
    TemporaryInternalStorageFileManager
    Help create and cleanup automatically uniquely named files in the given Context's internal cache directory.
    TvHelper  
    WeakReferencePassThroughEquals<T>
    A standard WeakReference, but with equality implemented by calling the underlying objects.
  • Enum Summary 
    Enum Description
    DebugMode.Mode
    The logging mode that you'd like for the Ooyala SDK None will remove all logs that come from the Ooyala SDK code.
